_xResult.title: Up and at 'Em Midi Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made midi skirt with hand-crafted texturized fabric
_xResult.longdesc:
Attack the day graciously in this hand-crafted midi skirt. The length is perfect for every day wearability and the craftmanship and artisan level attention to detail when it comes to the fabric demands the skirt stand out on its own.

 

Once you buy your first Aiste design, you'll be hooked. She is a true artisan and works with high quality and sustainable fabrics. In order to add more structure and visual interest to the linen fabric, it's first stitched with intricate textures. Then the garment is produced specific to your measurements so that it perfectly fits you and your curves.

 

If you've never experienced having a coat or jacket made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
